description:
This week, Bungie announced more layoffs, and the cancellation of Project Payload, a Destiny offshoot. Tam and Lucy discuss the impact of the Bungie layoffs on this week's Spot On. 
 
The layoffs at Bungie are the latest in widespread job losses in the industry and continues the trend of large corporations acquiring well-known developers and it leading to significant changes in staffing and, potentially, identity.
title: What's Next For Bungie? | Spot On

description:
Fallout London is out! If you own Fallout 4 on PC you can install London for free, but is it worth your time? Jake gives you the rundown on the latest ambitious mod project.

Mod: https://www.gog.com/en/game/fallout_london?gad_source=1&gclid=Cj0KCQjwh7K1BhCZARIsAKOrVqG1BoKk27IuMrBFxFcp_AVGZxc0r696FxoHXdMdCC4NbVqDpHt0fmUaAjszEALw_wcB&gogID=GAD_US_MAX_PURCH_GEN_SMART_ONG&r=true

Install guide: https://fallout4london.com/release/
title: Is Fallout London Worth Your Time?
